RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 77. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 28 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOLIDAY DECISION dueled early while between horses, shook clear on the turn, widened in the stretch under firm handling to win going away. FOR THE BISCUIT dueled with the winner n the inside, was no match late but was second best. SOMEBODYLOVESYOU pressed the pace three wide and weakened in mid stretch. LITURGIA was unhurried early and was no threat late. TABOO HOO tracked three wide and had no rally.

STORMIN'UNCLEJACK was allowed to settle early, rallied three wide and was up for place. CENTSOFWANDER was unhurried early, swung wide in the stretch and had a mild bid. RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 60. Maiden Claiming Purse 10500. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MANGORITA pressed the early pace, rallied at the quarter pole, exchanged bumps in mid stretch with ICY RAIN and drew clear late under strong handling. ICY RAIN had good position on the inside, rallied at the quarter pole and gained a slight lead, exchanged bumps with MANGORITA in mid stretch and was outfinished late. ASHWICKEN raced mid pack early, rallied at the quarter pole three wide and drew close, then flattened out in the lane. TEST YOUR FAITH was unhurried early and was no threat. FULL TIME STRUTIN raced wide early and was no threat. LEMONSANDDIAMONDS set the pace for three quarters, then gave way. TISTAAHAL raced mid pack and had no rally The stewards posted the inquiry sign and the rider of ICY RAIN claimed foul against the rider of MANGORITA for alleged interference in mid stretch. After viewing the tape the stewards took no action..

ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 83. Starter Allowance Purse 17600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 28 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 O r Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Multiple Winners For A Claiming Price Of $5,000 Or More In 2022 - 2023 Preferred)(Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOT DAME set the early pace with a clear lead, was hooked at the quarter pole, repulsed bid in late stretch and drew clear under strong handling. SPECIAL BEACH tracked three wide throughout, finished willingly and was up for place. CURT'S ANGEL chased the winner for five eights, rallied at the quarter pole and drew even, dueled until late stretch and was outfinished late. RAGTIME DOLLY had good position on the inside, had to steady in late stretch because of the loose horse and went evenly. GO STELLAIRE allowed to settle, failed to menace. PRESCIENCE stumbled badly at the start and lost her rider and walked off. The stewards posted the inquiry sign but took no action.

Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 28 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROSE RING was unhurried early, rallied in the stretch four wide, had a late burst and drew clear late. ROMANTIC JEWEL pressed the pace three wide throughout, finished willingly and held place. LA MUNECA set the early pace, was hooked in mid stretch and held well late. BEND THE KNEE had good position early, rallied in mid stretch and drew even, then was outfinished late. WESTLODGE INTRIGUE had good position while three wide and went evenly late. TAPALONG saved ground and was no menace. READY TO PLAY saved ground early, swung wide in the stretch and was no threat. ADULTING raced wide early and was outrun.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: CROSSED UP was never far back while racing four wide, rallied in the stretch four wide, had a late burst and drew clear late under strong handling. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 28 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In WeightAllowanc es).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AINT NO BANDLEADER dueled on the lead throughout, prevailed after a late long stretch battle under strong handling. MIXTER JENSEN had good position early, rallied three wide at the quarter pole and drew even, battled gamely in the stretch drive and just missed. FLAG RAISER vied for the lead until the top of the stretch and weakened slightly. ANIMO ROBERTO was unhurried early and trailed, rallied late and improved. PLAYING BALL had good position on the inside and went evenly late. PRIMITIVO dueled on the lead for a half, then gave way. HAPPY TAKEOVER was outrun. WHO CAN WIN was no menace.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 43. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: INDY CARR had good position early, rallied on the far turn and gained the lead, drew off in the stretch under steady handling. DANES HEART set the pace until the far turn, could not match strides late with the winner but held place. NOSEY POWER raced mid pack early, angled in stretch, finished willingly and was best of the rest. TRANSPIRED raced close up until the stretch, then weakened. BIG TIME FLIRT contended for three quarters, then gave way. MY TICKET hopped at the start, raced mid pack, lugged in stretch causing MUSIC GEM to check, then went evenly. MUSIC GEM was unhurried early, checked in the stretch on the rail and was no menace. PEDAL TO DA KETTLE was outrun. The stewards posted the inquiry sign and after viewing the tape disqualified MY TICKET and placed him seventh
